issue.title: [R] Fix sparklyr integration tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6576](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6576). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ticket just for our tracking purposes; the work will be done in the sparklyr repository.

ARROW-5505 moved a function that sparklyr uses, so the code there should adapt.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6576?focusedCommentId=16934847) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Closing; this is out of our hands now. See https://github.com/rstudio/sparklyr/pull/2133.
